T02D2910:310a-1: badzra bi d'a ra na n'a ma dh'a ra n'i bi dhi:/
T02D2910:310a-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga //
T02D2910:310b-0: rdo rje rnam par @310b 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2910:310b-1: zhi yang gdug 'dul khro mchog sku 'dud de yi cho ga bshad /
T02D2910:310b-2: rang skad cig gis lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i
T02D2910:310b-3: thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzungs
T02D2910:310b-4: kyi sngags bsams la de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas dang
T02D2910:310b-6: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02D2910:310b-9: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2910:310b-10: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol ba dang /
T02D2910:310b-11: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2910:310b-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba byas la /
T02D2910:310b-15: aom sh'u n+ya h'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba
T02D2910:310b-16: a'atma ko nya\ham zhes pas chos thams cad stong pa
T02D2910:310b-17: nyid du lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D2910:310b-18: de'i rjes la gzungs kyi yi ge sgra tsam la dmigs pa dang /
T02D2910:310b-19: de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2910:310b-20: gzungs kyi yig 'bru rnam par bsam pa dang /
T02D2910:310b-21: de yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2910:310b-22: chen po gzungs kyi yi ge rnams gzungs kyi tshul
T02D2910:310b-23: du nang na gnas par bsams la /
T02D2910:310b-24: de las phyag na rdo rje'i sku dpag tu med
T02D2910:310b-25: pa 'phros pas sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa
T02D2910:310b-27: bla na med pa'i byang chub la bkod de /
T02D2910:310b-28: slar 'dus nas zla ba la thim /
T02D2910:310b-29: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D2910:310b-30: na rdo rje'i thugs kyi sprul pa rdo rje rnam
T02D2910:310b-31: par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yas na
T02D2910:310b-32: sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med pa bsnams pa
T02D2910:310b-33: g-yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa /
T02D2910:310b-34: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2910:310b-35: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa /
T02D2910:310b-36: de'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzungs kyi yi ge rnams bsam mo //
T02D2910:310b-37: de'i sngags kyi 'od kyis mdun du ye shes sems
T02D2910:310b-38: dpa' rang dang 'dra ba lcang lo can gyi pho
T02D2910:310b-40: me tog gla sogs pas mchod nas bstod de /
T02D2910:310b-41: de gnyis kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng gi
T02D2910:310b-42: sngags las 'od 'phros pas sngags kyi yi ge rab
T02D2910:310b-44: ye shes sems dpa' sku dang de'i thugs ka'i zla ba dang /
T02D2910:310b-45: de'i steng gi gzungs kyi yi ge la la dmigs te gzungs gdon no //
T02D2910:310b-46: yang dam tshig sems pa'i gsung la dmigs te gzungs gdon no//
T02D2910:311a-0: @311a * // de bzhin du rim gyis thun bzhi ru gzungs 'bum bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa'o //
T02D2910:311a-1: de nas nad pa la sogs pa'i don du sa
T02D2910:311a-2: phyogs gtsang ma ru ba'i rnam pa lngas byugs te
T02D2910:311a-3: / me tog gi sil ma dgram par bya'o //
T02D2910:311a-4: phyogs skyong bcu dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'am /
T02D2910:311a-5: mandal gang yang rung ba byas la /
T02D2910:311a-6: rin po che'am sa las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa
T02D2910:311a-7: ba mi gnag pa nag por ri med par rin
T02D2910:311a-12: spos dri zhim po blugs te /
T02D2910:311a-13: ldum bus kha brgyan la mgrin par ras kyis dkri'o //
T02D2910:311a-14: bhr'um las rin po che'i bum par bskyed de bam las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho /
T02D2910:311a-15: pam las padma de'i steng du gong bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bskyed la /
T02D2910:311a-16: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te mchod bstod byas la gtor ma btang ste /
T02D2910:311a-18: de nas nad pa sdom pa 'dzin du bcug la /
T02D2910:311a-19: bum pa'i chus khrus byas na nad pa nad las thar par 'gyur ro //
